website_summaries.verdict: A caffeine-fueled protein powder that will give you a massive energy boost without the crash later on.
pros: Uses stevia instead of artificial sweeteners
cons: Contains 350 mg of caffeine per serving, which could leave you jittery

customer_reviews.title: TEN STARS ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST pre-workout on the market!!! No BS fillers, bad-A$$ not for the faint of heart, better pumps, more energy! I don't get the jitters from it but I am sure for people sensitive to caffeine wouldn't be able to handle a full serving, I stack this with creatine and trace minerals. If I could give this ten stars I would. I am about 270 lbs and have been working out for over 20 years, this has helped tremendously with making gains. This is also super clean compared to all other pre-workout supps, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: GymTime

customer_reviews.title: ZERO TO 100
customer_reviews.text: First I must say that previously to this I was using Pre-Jym for a few months. The taste is ok, not good but definitely not bad. Two serving options, 1 scoop for watching TV and 2 scoops for putting in work. Powder mixes up good, no clumping or anything. This definitely gets you up and motivated. I thought with all the caffeine that I was going to crash and burn like Maverick and Goose but to my surprise it let me down gently like a high school girlfriend. Little cheaper than Pre-Jym and a few more servings. Will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. I was able to increase my weights significantly ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never taken pre work out before but have been recently taking my fitness goals serious and decided to try supplements. This product is great. I was able to increase my weights significantly and not even feel a struggle. Although I hate that itchy tingly skin feeling, this is a sign of quality ingredients and that it is working. Also, being someone who deals with anxiety, I was nervous to try any stimulant but I experienced no jittery nervous feelings which makes me a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money, definetelly will look into other brands
customer_reviews.text: NO a good product. Turns into a sticky brick, cheesecake like. Hard to dissolve. I listed to the podcast they have and founders claim, if not satisfied just contact us and will issue a refund or replacement. This is not the case. Not easy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: vexas

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my early AM workout.
customer_reviews.text: I am 60 years old and workout 5-6 days a week. On resistance days i just didnt have the umph i needed. I thought i would try this to kickstart me at 4:30am and it is perfect. Was very pleased with the endurance of my workouts. I only take one scoop so have not had the jitters or feelings others experience as it is lighter dosage but gives me exactly what i need as i don't lift like when younger. Couldn't be happier. 2-25-19 This is my 2nd order after trying Cellucor C4 from Costco. It was much cheaper and more servings but did not even come close to the workouts I was getting with Pulse. Still happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McClendon

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was excellent. The product came in one piece without any ...
customer_reviews.text: I've finally decided to give pre-workout supplement a try and bought LEGION Pulse Pre-Workout Supplement - Fruit Punch flavor. The packaging was excellent. The product came in one piece without any damage to the container and arrived on time as promised. This supplement actually tastes very good when mix as directed. It actually gives me energy, strength, and endurance I needed throughout my workout session. It meets the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Best Pre-Workout without Creatine
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pre-workout supplement that I have taken. In the past I have taken a few others that I liked, however they had creatine in them and that always gave me a bloated feeling around the waist. I ordered the green apple in the pulse and it smelled really good, but I can barely taste any flavoring. I have used this on my weight lifting and cardio days. It also works well for those long runs. I am looking forward to trying out some of the other products in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G. Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works effectively and efficiently. I will say after a while though I began to not dig the preworkout body feeling. I wrote the reps and they helped me find another product of theirs that fit my needs and exchanged it so I could reach my fitness goals without wasting money on unused product. Above and beyond customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Legion pulse is my go to pre-workout. Very clean with no side effects(upset stomach, headache and no crash). Extreme focus and intense pumps! Don't waste your money on other garbage just because your buddy says so....try it yourself....you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying this pre workout since it came ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this pre workout since it came out with satisfactory results , the past two times i ordered , i don’t know if they change the formula or the ingredients , it gave me a headache and made me very thirsty .
customer_reviews.author: Tajeddine hamza

customer_reviews.title: Amazon gets one star (just read)
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving amazon a one star this product it’s self is great I’ve used it for a while and always get great results this time though is different . I bought two bottles both watermelon flavored this should come in a pink to white powder . Well when I opened a bottle “removing both seals. I find this over hydrated red idk what to call it but it’s like a fricking wet sand and is very hard to mix with water I blame amazon and they’re warehouse beware of how long an item might be sitting on a self for especially if the new and old aren’t rotated
customer_reviews.author: jamie  hernandez

customer_reviews.title: want my money back!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes from all the positive reviews on Amazon as well as a high rating on another website. I bought it for someone I care and trying to advise her on what to drink for Pre-workout. But honestly her Feedback on this product was worse than Bad she said: >>>>>>>> it tastes bad got the burning ants on my face and ears and was ready for the rush, energy, something..... Nothing at all. I tried it 3 times........and does not seem to provide much of any of an energy boost.......... But worse than that, the last few days she used it she have actually felt a little lightheaded and even sick during her workout.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible brain fog and difficulty concentrating. Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have used A LOT of preworkout before. The flavor is fine. The pump is good. BUT after about 3 weeks I noticed horrible brain fog occurring every day and stopped use. It took a while to get my mental clarity back. I waited a couple months and tried the product again. Immediate brain fog and difficulty concentrating. Ended up dumping the entire tub down the drain. So disappointed this product doesn't do better testing. Please consider what you're putting in your body and how it impacts your cognition. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Heiner

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitivities be careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out in burning hives!!! I’ve had that “tingle” from other preworkouts and they never bothered me. Until I tried this!!!! It was a terrible experience 15 mins after drinking this. Made my skin itch and burn and had to take emergency allergy meds to calm the reaction. Hope no one has the same thing happen. Absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Chemical overload
customer_reviews.text: Alright i thought as I see all the 5 star reviews... this pre is going to be awesome! I have tried many pre workouts. Probably all the ones you can find at GNC and vitamin shop. And this has to be the worst one I have tried. First of all it tastes like straight chemicals. And for me after I drank it would feel sick for at least an hour or two. Talk about a buzz kill to a workout. I figured maybe it was a one time thing.... but nope. Everytime I took it I would feel the same. Also... I'm pretty sure I lost muscle mass from taking this....
customer_reviews.author: David Mishler

customer_reviews.title: The Worst Pre-Workout - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking supplement for many years and this has been one of my worst purchases here on amazon. Gave it three tries to make sure it wasn't a one time thing but man the tingling sensation this gives just overpowers any type of "pump" or "energy boost" that the company says it brings. Disappointed and going back to Old School Pre.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Formula change is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Formula change is bad. I've used this for almost 3 years and it was the absolute best. I recommended it to everyone. I'm mitary so alot of people who workout and a large audience... The 2 recent bottles I ordered I noticed a change.. It tasted horrible, different and had a explosion effect. The explosion effect is when you shake it up and the cap busts open due to some pressure being caused by the drink (think like carbonation). They also removed 2 ingredients. Wth did you guys do to the best pre workout? You ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Temp

customer_reviews.title: I think they changed something.
customer_reviews.text: I just went through my 2nd tub of this stuff. I loved it the first tub that I went through so I bought a 2nd tub. I received it and I think they changed something. The powder was a different consistency and it didn't seem like it worked quite as well. Maybe my body is getting used to it. I'm going to try 1 more tub and I will update my review. I was 5 stars the first purchase but only 2-3 stars this last one.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Rex

customer_reviews.title: It changed, not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: Being using this for a couple of years now. Just like many companies before this one they thought changing the formula would be a good thing. It taste different and has no "punch". It is useless for a pre-workout. Good way to lose customers Legion. You lost this one.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing special. Im trying to figure out how its highly rated at BB.com and amazon. Third day taking 2 scoops and no boost in energy or performance. If i need to take more scoops then its not worth the price. I come from taking kaged and prejym where 1 serving is enough. As many have mention the taste is bad but i dont really drink preworkouts for the taste. Now i have to order a new preworkout.
customer_reviews.author: Slashinhobo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped use after heart/chest irregularities
customer_reviews.text: Did the formula suddenly change? While I’ve used this product for a while, in recent months it seems to trigger heart irregularities and chest aches. I am fit and healthy, so after seeing my PCP and a cardiologist to rule out any heart issues, I discontinued use of this product and the issue stopped. I was only using 1/2 to 1 full scoop. I chose this product because I read it was supposed to be one of the safer presupplents out there — I’m not convinced of that anymore. I hold this product responsible for the $600+ in medical bills when I thought it was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Order Grape - taste SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically about the taste of the product not the effects. The effects are good. I tried Blue Raspberry last time and that wasn’t bad. I thought I ordered Fruit Punch but got grape, so instead of sending it back I decided to try grape. IT WAS TERRIBLE. Stick with Blue Raspberry or it looks like people enjoy Fruit Punch, but for the love of everything that is when it comes to pre workout taste DONT ORDER GRAPE!
customer_reviews.author: maximus.cook

customer_reviews.title: Empty promises
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews left for this product, I decided to give it a try. Quite honestly, I wish I had just ordered the pre-workout I use already. This doesn’t seem to do anything AT ALL for me. If anything, it actually makes me more tired in a short amount of time after drinking it. On top of that, I had ordered appt flavour, and it has to be the worst thing I’ve ever tasted in any preworkout I have tried!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, killer energy.
customer_reviews.text: Switched from C4 to this. Been drinking pulse for about a year and I only just now went from one scoop to 1.5. I was drinking 2-3 of C4. I have fully charged workouts and it lasts through the full set. I can’t drink this past 2pm or I won’t sleep but it’s great in the morning for energy all day even after I lift. It kicks in around 15 minutes, I do get itchy till I move but I don’t get the jitters and once I run the itch is gone. Its also one of the cleanest formulas I’ve found. I don’t get sick drinking it on an empty stomach either. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rob n Em

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I thought I was going to die. This stuff is terrible. It tastes terrible and it makes you itch like crazy. I know some of the pre-workout drinks make you itch, but this stuff made my eyes and vagina itch. Not itch like allergies, I mean itch to the point where you almost want to pluck your eyes out. This stuff is the worst. Please don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Totally New Formuia with Terrible Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Legion updated the formula of Pulse without advertising. I took a photo of the "old" (2019) version, and the current version. The new version has more added ingredients and some new undefined proprietary ingredient. The Grape flavor went from a delightful bubbleyum bubblegum flavor to a wretched artificial grape flavor. I found the results of the new formula not as good as the previous version. I found myself feeling ill rather than energized during my workouts. It's disappointing that they revamped the formula without full disclosure.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but will opt for a different flavor next time
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Grape flavor and it's okay, but not my top choice. I'm up at 4AM to get to the gym by 4:30 to begin my work out. There are days that I just exhausted and after taking Pulse I can say it helped give me the kick start and motivation I needed to get off my butt and get my workout in. I was so glad I did and thankful for the boost. I also purchased the fruit punch non caffeinated option for my evening workouts. It gave me the kick I needed and I had no problems getting to sleep. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: GGM

customer_reviews.title: Reeearch - better options available
customer_reviews.text: Attempted MANY times to post a review on their website and they never put it on not responded. As a CSCS coach and instructor, my athletes and I have found several alternatives that are better and healthier. Please do your homework before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sidedish2

customer_reviews.title: Check seal before use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a bit late, still got to my house. The pulse had a bit of a seal problem. The inner seal that meets the plastic rim was half way opened. Maybe apply more heat when your machine seals off the contents inside. Not so sure I'll be using the product. Recharge gets rid of the soreness quickly. These products are better than JYM Supplements, No synthetic colors, flavor's, no aspartame, also marketed as : Splenda , Sweet N Low, Spoon Full, Sucralose, Sucralean ( a VPX made sweetener ). Legion doesn't lie, the product is 100% Natural ( NO BS ) Give this a try !
customer_reviews.author: NetWorkPro

customer_reviews.title: Don deliver results
customer_reviews.text: I was taking Pre-jym before , and I was looking for something different to try, now, this product cost almost the same , and deliver only half of results, whit pre- jym you have to use 1 scoop, whit legion 2 scoops and. I didn’t feel anything, now I have to buy another preworkout again.....
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Best out of any competing options available to date
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a ton of different crap, it's hard to weed through all the crazy marketing BS fancy labels paid sponsorship nonsense when it comes to sports supplements/nutrition these days so you really need to the research yourself. Look at the ingredients and percentages and read up on it, avoid BS fillers such as creatine , bcaa etc. as all that stuff is cheap and if a manufacturer is filling your product with it, it's an automatic red flag. Legion Pulse pre-workout, Muscle Feast unflavored protein blend & casein are the only drink/shake workout product I will take until there is a better option which there is isn't at the time of writing this review
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The little train that couldn't
customer_reviews.text: The product did not live up to the hype. For the same money I can get a lot more from other products. I really, really expected this product to wow me due to the list of ingredients. Sad to say, the opposite happened. I immediately returned the product, and Amazon quickly handled the return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jlee1546

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better.
customer_reviews.text: With 1 scoop I barely notice any energy boost. With 1.5 scoops my ears itch so bad I can’t stop itching them long enough to workout. My wife has totally stopped using it cause it made her sick.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Watson

customer_reviews.title: Like A Bad Energy Drink
customer_reviews.text: Relies too much on the caffeine for a kick and the flavor is abysmal. Overall there just wasn't any redeeming qualities and, at this price point, there's definitely better (and MUCH cheaper) options out there
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck. Best pre workout!!
customer_reviews.text: Im taking L. Pulse first thing in the morning 15 minutes before my workout. It has given me so much energy and endurance without the excessive itching or tingling feeling. The only thing I would say is that it take at least 15 minutes for me to feel the full effect since it pretty much activates when you start raising your ❤️ rate. The last photo is my new supplements I’m trying as if 7/1/20 for weight loss and so far I’m loving 🥰 them 👏🏽👍🏽.
customer_reviews.author: Criss

customer_reviews.title: Good product, taste isn't bad.
customer_reviews.text: I tried both the grape, and the blue raspberry, ordered on separate occasions. Both flavors weren't bad, compared to other brands. This preworkout definitely helped to kick start my gains in the gym. I like the beta tingles, weird that people complain about that. Haha Anyway, my only complaint is that there are cheaper preworkouts that give ME comparable results. Everyone's different...this could be the best or worst you've ever tried. I definitely would recommend giving this a try, though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Valitalo

customer_reviews.title: and it's not terrible, but next time I think I'll get a ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well for me when I take one scoop, half the suggested serving size. However, the one time I took two, I basically ended up working out all morning. The tingles and jitters throughout my body were bordering unbearable. I'm not sure if it's just my personal intolerance of that much caffeine or what, but I can't handle it. Taking one helps me get through a decently long work out at the gym. I ordered the blue raspberry, and it's not terrible, but next time I think I'll get a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble_Bee_101

customer_reviews.title: Formula change :(
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using blue raspberry pulse for over a year and had finally found the best pre-workout I had ever used. I reordered it recently and immediately noticed a change (I actually thought they had sent me the wrong product). While the old formula was light, easy drinking and tasty, this newer formula is heavier and sweet and kinda foamy. Hard to get down but it still gets the job done. I was really disappointed that it changed as well as the fact that there was no notification of the product changing. Hoping they go back to the original formula, but until then might have to find something different
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Haramut

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: Seriously disappointed in this pre workout, I usually use Old School brand pre workout but I thought I might want to try others to see if there was something better out on the market. I did some research to find the best pre workout and I came up with Legion Pulse. I was looking forward to using it because it is much healthier for you than Old School pre workout and had great reviews , but It just flat out does not do anything for me. It does not get me hyped, does not make me energetic, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best preworkut ive ever taken.
customer_reviews.text: Ive taken every preworkout, one that comes to mind the most (jack3d, original formula) which was phenomenal. I don't have any gripes, but if youre expecting to have this delicious drink, you wont. The flavor is light, but not nasty. Think of drinking have a Gatorade bottle, then adding water to it. The energy is smooth for, I get a very slight itch and I know im ready to kill some weights, I like how I feel on two scoops but look into your tolerance. Im in the gym for two hours on this stuff, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jorgen1990

customer_reviews.title: Sustained Focus, Maximal Performance
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Pulse for years since I read Mike's Bigger Leaner Stronger. I've used other pre-workouts in the past and most would not dissolve into water as well as this does. I hated the rough texture of chalky dust that I'd have to bite into as the pre-workout was down to its last sips. NO LONGER! Pulse dissolves so well, the flavors are true and the focus and performance boost is something I can't go to the gym without anymore. Go through periods of taking just one scoop and periods of two and then periods of taking less so that you never grow tolerant.
customer_reviews.author: Julio S.

customer_reviews.title: Barfed Before Beefing Up On It
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great product. But I don't know. Because it didn't stay in my stomach long enough for me to workout on it. I got the caffeine free blue raspberry. Used the amount of water they recommended.. Shook it up in my shaker bottle and hopped in the car.. The flavor was fine. Until I swallowed it- and it felt and tasted like alka seltzer in my throat. Pulled over on the side of the road going to the gym and barfed. Hahaha. I could have been just really sensitive. But I hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Slam D

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with the product. After using it the first time I got an ugly feeling in my stomach. Later to find out the top layer of product was loose and fine but the bottom layer was hard and clumpy dumping it out to find out if it just needed to be broken down I found 3 desiccant packets at the bottom clumped in with the product. Not sure if maybe the product got wet during packaging or not but I won’t be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how effective it is
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a specific Pre Workout formula. I researched it quite a bit before choosing this. I have started off conservatively with about 60% of one scoop. Without a doubt, I am able to work out harder using this. It is too early to definitely know but I think using Pulse will help me with gains in strength and size. While I cannot compare Pulse with other formulas, I would definitely recommend it for someone considering a PreWorkout supplement.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: C4 no more!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm about a week into using this and its really good. I have been using C4 regularly for the past 7 years & never thought i woukd change. After weeks of researching I decided to give Pulse a try. It recommends two scoops & so far one is plenty. I work out 6 day aweek old school bodybuilding program hitting all major muscle groups twice a week and I have to say the pumps are amazing & lots of focus with no crash. I would give 5 stars, but price is high & its a little gassy, lots of burps , but would definitely recommend this product. It lso have Citrulline Malate.... great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jwechef

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and performance
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this preworkout for anyone looking for extra energy and focus to push their workouts to the max. The taste is mild and flavored well unlike other preworkouts I’ve hadn’t that are too potent. The ingredients are natural, simple, and does not contain any excessive or over the top ingredients. I felt the results and energy burst within about 15 minutes of drinking one serving and it gave me more than enough energy to power through my 2 hour workout.
customer_reviews.author: Nato S.

customer_reviews.title: Jitters. Made me more itchy than any other pre workout
customer_reviews.text: Preworkouts make you a little itchy but this one made it to where I couldn’t even workout I was so uncomfortable. And legit he not extra boost to want to work out harder. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but might make you itchy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product around 10 times and every time I get a horrible, itchy, stinging sensation in my extremities and groin. It’s very uncomfortable and lasts around 15 minutes. I usually just power through it but it’s pretty distracting. I’ve tried using less powder and never work out on an empty stomach so I don’t know why this happens. Once the discomfort stops, I do find I have a lot more energy and can endure more reps than without this product. That said, I won’t buy this again and probably won’t finish it. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ronquillo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad at all
customer_reviews.text: "Natural flavor and colors"; gives good energy and focus; not too jittery. good workouts for all!! I only use one scoop and it seems to do the trick even though the can says a serving is "two scoops". I'd stick with starting with one. I like Creatine in my pre-workout so I do add a teaspoon of that (which is not very expensive). My wife also likes this supplement and approves of "no artificial" sweeteners and colors as well. I've used ON pre-workout and Muscle Pharm and this is every bit as good for me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me great workouts, but the side-effects dramatically outweighed the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave me stomach issues while I was on it. Switched pre-workouts after using it for the past couple years and now my stomach issues seemed to have subsided. I can’t think of any other cause then Pulse. Would make me have to go to the bathroom within minutes after taking it. Gave me great workouts, but the side-effects dramatically outweighed the one positive. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Peacock

customer_reviews.title: High hopes... very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been around the block tried a lot of different pre workout products. I had heard of legion products and with great marketing and a line up of great sponsored athletes I thought I’d give it a try. Now I based my purchase on ingredients I was previously taking nutrex research Outlift . I was expecting similar if not better performance. I’ve been taking it for two weeks taking two scoops and honestly feel nothing. No pump.. no energy.. absolutely zero endurance... I’m not knocking the company and it could just be me but I feel nothing. My results may just be mine but this is just based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Great Energy
customer_reviews.text: I used Legion Pulse before my workout and was surprised at how well it tasted! i also had great long lasting energy for my whole workout and didn't have to worry about a mid workout crash like some other pre workouts give me. I plan on using this preworkout from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: You get actual doses
customer_reviews.text: I've taken a lot of pre workouts over the years and the price doesn't always justify the ingredients. Not the case here. Not the cheapest out there but reasonably priced and has sufficient ingredients to match. Gave me plenty of energy for a 1.5 hour leg day and plenty of tingles to boot. The taste is good too. It came in great condition and with plenty of silica packs to keep it fresh. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and easy to mix with blender bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken several different preworkouts and by far this one has the best taste and it mixes smoothly so I don’t end up feeling like I’m drinking chalk. I’ve only been taking one scoop but I’m thinking of trying two soon to see if I get a little more bang out of it. Over all this stuff is great! I’m even buying the recharge now to give that a shot as well!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Solid PWO IMO.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried Fruit Punch, Tropic. Punch, and Green Apple. I’ve liked this PWO over many I’ve tried. It’s a little more pricey because it’s one of few PWO that tell you what exactly your putting in your body. Most others are a “proprietary blend”. The other main competitor that I’ve tried that stacks up to this PWO is PRE-JYM which I have tried and still find Pulse better. In terms of flavor, Green Apple Flavor was my least favorite, and Tropic. Punch is my preferred Flavor. Keep in mind PWO aren’t like strength bonuses in a game. How you diet and train play more of a part in how you attack the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best preworkout taste and energy
customer_reviews.text: Best preworkout I’ve tired. Finally, one that doesn’t smell like paint thinner! The fruit punch flavor is like a mango/passion fruit/guava taste. It reminded me of the juice you get with breakfast at a certain theme resort in Florida. So hard not to drink this all day, it’s that good. It really energized my workout too, great pump (heavier weights), lots of sweat! My new favorite. If it matters to anyone I’m a girl.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Ordered cherry limeade, received fruit punch. Was charged for the more expensive product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered cherry limeade but received fruit punch. I don't get why fruit punch is $5 cheaper than the rest if you're just going to send it to me when I pay for a more expensive flavor anyway. I had the fruit punch flavor before, and I like it, but I wanted to try a different flavor this time. Good pre-workout though, does its job. Still only giving this one star since I got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Em Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre-workout for Gym Rats
customer_reviews.text: My husband had previously used C4 and a few other preworkouts and always complained about the after taste and crash. Since switching to Legion, he has not complained one bit and has been recommending it to all his gym rat friends. He loves the fact that it uses natural ingredients and it gets him energized quickly. He switches between Tropical Punch and Blue Raspberry. Coming from a guy who doesn't care for much, this is definitely a good product if he's recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Works and is safe for those with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of hunting for a natural supplement that would wake me up in the morning. I also have high anxiety and have to be careful because some products will make me feel like I'm having a panic attack. I only take one scoop and it feels mild. No jitters. Helps me get moving in less than 30min. Taste isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Happy but also empty lol
customer_reviews.text: So I just started lifting with this preworkout this week. I’ve tried numerous others in the past, but taste wise, this one is the best. Gives me the tingles and a steady energy to power through and go heavier. That said, it goes right through me/gives me the 💩. Having to run to the gym bathroom three times per workout is a little embarrassing, so I took a star for that reason. Otherwise I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pulse is my go to pre-work out supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Pulse has really worked well for me. I’m 61, 240 lbs. and I train five days a week. My endurance has improved using pulse and I it energizes me before each workout so I can train harder. There’s no jitters and the flavor it’s very good. I tried several other pre-workout supplements and by far pulse is the best for me. Get after it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a product I can love!
customer_reviews.text: We have used C4, Lit and GNC's pre workout previously and just weren't 100% happy with any of them. I did some research and found this stuff. We are beyond impressed!!! I don't get that sick almost want to throw up, burping in the gym and horrible crash making me cranky after feelings. I noticed a more consistent level on energy with this. The Grape tastes awesome, by far the best taste of any we have tried. Thank you for making this great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Not too sweet, tastes great, no harsh feeling
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great without being over sweet, and no artificial sweeteners. The supplement industry things everything needs to taste unbearably sweet, which comes with a bad artificial sweetener undertone. Doesn't make me feel like I'm on fire, but definitely work up from half dose to make sure it doesn't hit too hard. I have used this and three other pre-workouts, and this one is tied for first with one other brand. The others made me feel way too jacked up: tingly teeth, skin, and scalp, and that was only on a half dose of those.
customer_reviews.author: James Muskopf

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I think they have changed the product. This used to be my favorite pre workout but I stopped taking it for a while. The taste is slightly different than it used to be but more importantly it doesn’t affect me like it used to. I used to take 1/4 of a scoop and my face would tingle and I would be amped with energy for my workout. I use a whole scoop of this stuff (and I am not used to caffeine) and it doesn’t do anything, or very little to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Williamson

customer_reviews.title: itchy/burning feeling similar to runners itch
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Good energy boost (for both lifting and running) and good mental focus booster. My only dislike is the tingly, burning-itch sensation in the face area. I highly recommend if you do high intensity work or any training over an hour long. The burning itchy sensation is bearable, just annoying. It lasts for about 30-45 mins. The flavor sucks but is bearable (green apple). I drank one scoop per 1.5 cups of water.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer007

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff and no hidden mixtures.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that mike and his team are 100% transparent. All ingredients are in clinically effective doses and they can actually link you to the studies and the data that show the doses of each individual ingredient and why. I am cheap, no lie. I hate wasting money on “extreme pump mega matrix proprietary blend” that is mostly filler. Most supplements are a waste. Pre- workout for me is worth it for the usefulness of the components and the fact that I can’t drink coffee before I go lift. It just feels wrong to drink a hot beverage before going to the gym. I’m odd.
customer_reviews.author: Aedan382

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Granted it's been over 6 years since I've been active in the gym, I'm trying to get "serious" again. Ordered this pre-workout drink mix as well as Legion's Recharge for post-workout. This substance seems to mix well in water, and actually tastes pretty good. That's honestly the only "PRO" I can provide. After a 6 workouts I'm still waiting on that "rush" that provides extra "pump". The pre-workout I used years ago was almost like "copping a buzz", lol, and apparently that's what I'm expecting with this stuff, and it's not there. JMO.
customer_reviews.author: Old Geezer Doing Stuff

customer_reviews.title: taste is horrible and didnt feel anything
customer_reviews.text: that was my first time trying pulse and now i regret it as usually when i try other preworkouts i feel the kick after 15 or 30 minutes from taking it like rush or c4 but this one taste horrible and it doesnt taste anything close to green apple like i ordered plus didnt feel anything at all even after an hour into working out with full dose of 2 scoops , next month im going back to order rush and stick with it cuz its better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First pre-workout
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a pre-workout. I've spent the last 40 days in intense weight training and wanted something to get me prepped and ready to last. It may be true for all pre-workouts, but the taste was horrible. (again, I have nothing to compare it to). I will try using less water so I don't have as much volume to drink. Also, I wasn't ready for the skin tingles. Felt slightly burning/itchy. But it went away after like 30 min. overall, I'm happy with the results and pleased with the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've used this prior to three strength-training workouts, and I'm not impressed. I don't care for the flavor, and I don't get a boost like I've gotten from other pre-workout products (and I definitely don't get the ridiculous "Superhuman Endurance" as advertised on the label; pure marketing hype for people without critical thinking skills).
customer_reviews.author: David M. Syndergaard

customer_reviews.title: Did what it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time this morning and I was impressed and happy. I expected my heart rate to sky rocket and my face to get super red and stay that way, but my heart and face both felt normal. The way it did manifest was in my ability to continue doing walking lunges way past where I usually stop, and picking up a little heavier weights than I would normally use. I haven't really felt a huge crash, but I could tell when it was leaving my system. And I didn't mind the taste as much as I expected to. Overall I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pillsbury

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have gotten this product and it’s amazing! I think it could use a little bit for flavor but other then that it gives me a good pump and it dose not have a much of crap in it that’s bad for you. Super clean pre work out!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Clean, long-lasting energy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Pulse as a preworkout for a few years now. I love that there are no artificial ingredients. About 15 minutes after taking it, I feel it starting to take effect. I recommend starting with one scoop and seeing how you feel. I would also wait about 10 minutes before leaving your house because the caffeine may cause a laxative effect. There is definitely the tingling feeling that lasts a good 20 to 30 minutes. I use this product to help wake me up in the morning and motivate me to go work out. This is actually one of my favorite flavors. I mix it with about 4 oz. of water so the flavor is more concentrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LG

customer_reviews.title: I actually didn't really like it. I wanted to like it so badly ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't really like it. I wanted to like it so badly because I was attracted to the minimal ingredients and it wasn't a proprietary blend. But, I hated the taste and I didn't really notice any noticeable energy differences. HOWEVER, I've found this to be true with other preworkouts so maybe it's just me, I ended up giving it to a friend and she did like it! Also, I gave it a high rating because after I tried it and didn't like it, I contacted Legion and they were very good and cooperative about trying to remedy my problem. They gave me a full refund, told me to keep the product and asked if I wanted something else.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great preworkout supplement! I can't have caffeine late in the day, so I appreciate that Legion makes a version without caffeine. Gives me energy for my workout and the tropical punch flavor is great! Pleased to know all the ingredients and that it does not contain fillers. I use it before all my workouts! I've purchased it multiple times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pre-workout. I find that it really helps me stay focused during my workout and gives me the energy I need to withstand a tough workout. The only bad thing I would say is that the price jumped up quite a bit since I bought it the first time and I just don't think I can shelf out that price for a pre workout. But I really enjoyed the Blue Raspberry flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Great energy boost
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I drink the tropical punch flavor now. I originally ordered the blue raspberry kind but the punch is way better. I also add more water than it calls for to dilute the taste. I feel great when I drink it. I have been drinking it for about 5 months now. I have two kids, i work weird hours. I'm tired and lazy. I drink this stuff and I'm ready to ROLL. It makes me sweat big time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All hype
customer_reviews.text: Have tried quite a few pre workouts and did a lot of research on this item. A lot of different articles listed this in the top 3, so I had high Hope's. Definitely underwhelming, the boost you get is very short. Between cardio and lifting I am in the gym for 2 to 2 and 1/2 hrs and this fizzles out about an hr into workout. I have used the recommended 2 scoops as well for that time frame. Different people react differently to supplements, maybe worth the try but I am not a fan. I prefer JYM but will continue to look for something new
customer_reviews.author: Chris c.

customer_reviews.title: Watermelon tastes kinda strange, but works well
customer_reviews.text: Moved to this after C4 Original (orange) and VintageBlast (blueberry lemonade or something). I switched from those because C4 gave a huge crash and VintageBlast didn't ever dissolve fully and the sediment made me want to vomit. I got the watermelon flavor, and it's fine but not necessarily easy to get down. On the bright side, it dissolves fully and definitely doesn't taste *bad*, just kinda weird. It works very well, gave me a lot more energy and no crash afterward. I might try a different flavor, but overall I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful clean energy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken other pre-workouts and most don’t even compare to Pulse. It gives you so much energy due to all the beta alanine they put in it. Plus it’s all natural, no artificial colors or sweetners. And if you go to their website they tell you everything that is in their products and why. 2 scoops is a full serving and it will give you the jitters. You can also just take 1 scoop and get enough energy. There’s nothing wrong with Pulse, so definitely can’t give it a bad review. The only thing that would make this better is bcaas. But overall it’s hard to find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I had the fruit punch flavor which is not overpowering or overly sweet either. This is my second time buying and ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the few supplements that I have had over the years that I didn't have to choke down. It gives a pleasant energy rush which is pertinent for me since I do my lifting about 5 - 6 a.m, although I have to state that I do have a cup of black coffee in tandem too when I first get up. I had the fruit punch flavor which is not overpowering or overly sweet either. This is my second time buying and am happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've sampled a bunch of pre workouts but tis has been my favorite by far. i like that it only really contains natural ingredients. It definitely makes my face and ears itch in the first 10-15 minutes of vonsuming, and while that is unpleasant, the energy I get from it is worth it. I don't get the shakes, I dont feel like I've cobsuned too much caffeine, I just feel like I woke up from an amazing night of sleep. The down is very gradual but it doesn't ever leave me crashing. i had previously been taking nuclear armageddon- which I liked, but definitely left me crashing. I also tried C4 but it made me super jittery and unfocused.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Works well but tastes kinda gross
customer_reviews.text: My go-to pre-workout before this was Beachbody E&E (so sad they discontinued it!) It had a lemon-lime flavor which was actually tasty. Lemon-lime wasn't an option, so I ordered the Grape flavor, which is normally a favorite flavor of mine in general. As some others stated- l also thought it had a distinctly strong medicinal taste. The energy kick from it was intense and steady (no crash after). I like how it performs just not how it tastes. I would possibly try another flavor but it would be great to have samples so you don't have an entire tub of something you are choking down and don't really like.
customer_reviews.author: Must love water

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pre Workout
customer_reviews.text: I will say right off the bat I don't really like the taste. BUT I know these are the best pre workouts out there with the best ingredients so hell, I can endure the taste! I really like the energy Pulse gives me to give it my all in the gym. I'm focusing on heavy weights and 6-7 reps and I feel like Pulse really helps! Also I don't feel a crash later on after it's worn off. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: No crash! No jitters!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this is everyone! As I started getting into fitness and working out a lot I was trying so many different products and they all left me jittery with a huge crash afterwards. No jitters with this product and definitely no crash!! I’ve tried many of the flavors and they taste great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Pulse as before
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash compared to their blue label version. One blue label scoop made me feel like Superman. One pink label scoop makes me feel the same as drinking BCAAs. Of course, I could increase the amount of scoops but I never had to do that before and that's the reason I gave the pink label a try. Time to see what other preworkouts are out there.
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: It works and it works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for years now, all the different flavours. I can say at the very least, that working out with this and without it is definitely noticeable. It tastes fine, takes about 20 minutes to kick in, for me at least, and you do get a little itchy feeling in your skin but I don't mind it. In fact, I take it as a sign that it's working. I take one scoop before the workout, and a second in my water bottle if it's a heavy day. The most important thing in working out is staying consistent, that's how you see results, and this really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jevgenija Hess

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Legions Pulse Preworkout for over 4 years now. It is the only PreWorkout that I’ve ever used that my body didn’t get used to. The pumps are great as are the flavors. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Hefley

customer_reviews.title: Great pumps with this preworkout!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many preworkout drinks over the years but I’ve found my new favorite. Other products I’ve tried tend to cause an inopportune trip to the restroom due to a laxative effect, but not so with pulse. My stomach feels line after taking it, which is a definite plus. It gives a really great boost to my workouts and improved pumps. The preworkout tingles are present, but not overwhelming. All in all, this preworkout is a great addition to any routine!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: Severe allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Be careful buying this. I attempted to use this product 3 times and each time I had a severe allergic reaction to it. Return window closed so I cannot return it. Waste of money as I cannot use it again. Took it and my body began to itch really bad followed by hives.
customer_reviews.author: Angelhearty15

customer_reviews.title: Made some bad changes
customer_reviews.text: They definitely made some changes, and for the worse. I’ve tried a ton of different preworkouts and Legion was my favorite so I’ve stuck with it for a long time. Now the product gets extremely foamy and tasted slightly carbonated. The old version was easy to drink, this new version is pretty gross. Ordered two flavors like I always do, so this review is for the blue raspberry. The seal on the pink lemonade was broken so I’m pretty hesitant to even try that one. Overall very disappointed that I’ll likely have to try something new again next time. Don’t fix something that isn’t broken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients used do not reflect the price you pay for the product. In addition, the de-clumping powder they use here creates a mist in the air every time you open this which gets into your lungs. It mixes well, but does not taste great and the energy boost does not last very long. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: like I can't understand why you even need to load ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the Jym Pre/Post supplement system, but my body can't tolerate the creatine, so I usually make my own pre and post from wholesale nootropic websites. I've been too lazy to make a 90 day supply, so I figured I'd give this a try. The amount of beta alanine in here is ridiculously high; like I can't understand why you even need to load that much? The lack of BCAA also kinda kills it for me. Ingredient list is really good on paper, but I really thought it would perform better than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great workouts!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a long time, I have finally found the perfect pre workout for me. I love this product. For my, needs I don’t take the full dose, I usually take one to one & a half scoops. It tastes great and gives me that push to have amazing workouts with no let down afterwards. Get this product, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I haven't taken a pre-workout formula in a long time but this Legion Pulse gets the job done. I got the green apple flavor and I'm not a huge fan of it, but it does mix well so I just gulp it down quickly. The only downside is that I workout in the evenings (4:30 pm) and it keeps me up at night. I was afraid of that and was the reason I haven't taken a pre-workout in some time but after loaing motivation I needed somwthing to get me back energized in the gym. Legion Pulse definitely does that as my workouts have been much better than they were before using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Endurance Increase
customer_reviews.text: A gentleman named Arti asked how I was enjoying the product. I have him an honest review and I had mentioned that I did not like the fruit punch flavor. A couple of days later there's a box on my door with a new flavor! He recommended blue raspberry so he shipped one to me by surprise and NO CHARGE. Thank you Arti for the amazing costumer service. I will continue to be a long term costumer! On the first workout I for jitter, after that it went away. I noticed significant increases in edurance and strength. As my first pre workout I want to do make sure I did it right the first time, I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Feels good but doesnt taste the best
customer_reviews.text: It is all natural and healthier then other pre workouts that is probably why it tastes bad. For me my pre workout is to give me a pump and make me feel good before I start working out. Personally, I dont mind some sugar and flavoring as I keep track of my nutrient and know that it wont impede tremendously with my gains. The tingling and pump feeling is also less then other pre workout I have used before. Dont get me wrong, the taste is NOT awful. I know there are much worse tasting pre workouts out there. Its just that for the cost it doesnt seem worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I generally take a half dose, since my normal diet doesn't include any caffeine and I have no tolerance built up. With most preworkouts, even a half dose makes me feel manic, so I typically only used it when I was feeling particularly unmotivated on a training day as a sort of self-extortion ("Get to the gym and work off some of this energy, or you're going to die of a heart attack"). A half dose of Pulse just makes me feel like I took a good power nap. It's a much more comfortable experience. It's far and away my favorite preworkout.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Springer

customer_reviews.title: Increaded focus and energy.
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hours a day 6 days a week. The last thing I want to do is go to the gym after or wake up early to workout. Until... I drink this concoction of an explosion in a shaker bottle and 10 minutes later I develop tunnel vision more insane than traveling 210mph via hayabusa on an flight line runway. If redbull gives you wings, this shit gives you F-35 jet engines. The lifting never stops and the pump is more intense than an adrenalin shot straight through the sternum. An absolute must buy.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Effects don't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Man I really wanted to like this stuff. The taste is excellent (I got the grape flavor), the ingredients are top quality and I really like the company. Unfortunately after trying it for a little over a week and alternating between using one and two scoops I've found it just doesn't have any legs. I drink the preworkout about 15-20 minutes before I start exercising and the effects are almost gone by the time I finish my second exercise. If this lasted a little longer I would buy Pulse regularly but as it is I will probably need to give the rest to a friend and hope it works better for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Legion Pulse, Best Natural Pre Workout Supplement for Women and Men – Powerful Nitric Oxide Pre Workout, Effective Pre Workout for Weight Loss. (Fruit Punch)
feature_bullets: 100% ALL NATURAL PRE WORKOUT POWDER. Pulse is a naturally sweetened and flavored pre workout supplement that contains large and effective doses of the best science-backed ingredients, including those found in many nitric oxide supplements: L citrulline malate, betaine, beta alanine, alpha gpc, caffeine, and L theanine.

BOOSTS ENERGY & FOCUS. Mix a serving of this preworkout for women and men with water, swig it down, and get fired up and zeroed in and crush your workout . . . and without the jitters, upset stomach, or post-workout crash.
ENHANCES STRENGTH & ENDURANCE. This all natural preworkout powder is a nitric oxide booster and helps you push more weight and reps, get bigger and better pumps, and gain more muscle and strength.

GUARANTEED RESULTS OR YOUR MONEY BACK. If you're not 100% satisfied with this preworkout for men and women, just notify us and we’ll give you a prompt and courteous refund on the spot. No complicated forms and no return necessary.

THE MAN BEHIND THE BRAND. Tired of the exaggeration and lies of the workout supplements industry? So was Mike Mathews, international bestselling fitness author with over a million books sold, and that's why he created Legion Athletics.
